channel.title: ~!~Bryanc Help~!~
channel.description:
Well just as the title, My help. I am here to offer help as much as I can. This will make it easier for me to help people. Instead of switching threads... I can just come to one here.
Well I can help with most stuff, but some I can't. So just post :D And I will try my best. If I don't know I will give you a link or direct you in the right direction... (playername, website...)
NOTE: Please be patient... I can only do one thing at a time...
Happy asking... :D
Let's Keep it going... Also feel free to help me out :D
~bryanc~

item.title: ~!~Bryanc Help~!~
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

No in the run server (runserver.bat) you should have the following

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 01:43:44 PM[/size][hr]Put this in your compiler if you have jdk1.5.0_09 and jre1.5.0_09

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09in/java.exe" server pause

Read full topic

item.title: ~!~Bryanc Help~!~
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Ok you are sure you don’t have another one open at the same time? Make sure of that because ti wont open two at once. And you cant have the compiler and runserver opne at the same time. Because they both run the server. So close both and re open one.

Read full topic

item.title: ~!~Bryanc Help~!~
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

I’m Back! open for helping :D[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 11:49:55 AM[/size][hr]For java downloads here you go… :rolleyes:

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp[br][size=1]Posted at: November 07, 2006, 12:14:23 PM[/size][hr]For the person i am helpiung on msn

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server pause

Put your server name instead of YOURSERVERNAME

[glow=red,2,300]For others useing this for their compiler make the _09 and _06 fit to your java.[/glow]

item.title: ~!~Bryanc Help~!~
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“Burt, post:153, topic:22735”]i need a auto saver that works for testscape please, thanks

~Burt[/quote]
Go to antilag.java
and replace everything in the folder with this:

[code]// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 9999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
